info.name: Stinto.net Font Changer
info.description: Times New Roman may be a classic, but sometimes you want something more readable and modern. This style changes TNR to Ubuntu, or any other font of your choosing!
info.additionalInfo:
10.31 - Stinto updated their layout just one day after I release this style, hahaha. I've fixed it to be compatible with the new website. Enjoy! (RIP Night Mode)

11.9 - Stinto changed their URL! I have edited the script to reflect that.
